title: Lucca Ferraz
text: Welcome to my website! I am a Junior at Rice University majoring in Statistics and Sport Analytics, with minors in Data Science and Financial Computation and Modeling.

title: Carnegie Mellon Sports Analytics Camp Capstone
text:
Research Question: How can we best explain the variance of batted passes in the NFL on a play-by-play basis?
Utilized a multilevel model taking into account quarterback and defensive team as random effects, with information about the play (ex. formation, pass location) as fixed effects.

title: EDA
text: Analyzed factors most important to winning in the Women’s Tennis Association. Applied k-means clustering to group players based on their performance on break points.
